chunks.chunk_text: Hi there,歡迎收聽Look Back Sunday回顧星期天在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家與主題的熱門更多文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界時事趣聞我們這週來聽聽南美洲的趣聞Let's get started

chunks.chunk_text: The country that a decade ago was the largest producer in Latin America, earning about 90 billion US dollars a year from oil exports, is expected to net about 2.3 billion US dollars by the year's end, less than the aggregate amount that Venezuelan migrants who left the country's economic devastation will send back home to support their families, according to Pilar Navarro, a Caracas-Venezuela-based economist.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 南美時事趣聞 All about South America 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: Production is the lowest in nearly a century after sanctions forced most oil companies to stop drilling for or buying Venezuelan oil, and even that trickle could dry up soon, analysts warn.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 南美時事趣聞 All about South America 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: Crippling gasoline shortages have led to an outbreak of dozens of daily protests
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 南美時事趣聞 All about South America 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: into the United Nations.The country now has the highest poverty rate in Latin America, overtaking Haiti this year, according to a recent study by Venezuela's three leading universities.Next article

chunks.chunk_text: on the city's world-class beaches, Samba-filled music scene, and Caipirinha-fuelled parties.Violent crimes is rarely listed among the attractions.But in an embarrassing social media snafu this week, the Brazilian tourist board, Embra Tour, accidentally shared a critical Instagram post from a tourist who did not enjoy her stay in the so-called Cidade Maravilhosa, or Marvelous City.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 南美時事趣聞 All about South America 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: Embra Tour deleted the shared post on Wednesday.It said in a subsequent statement that sharing the post was a mistake.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 南美時事趣聞 All about South America 回顧.json

chunks.chunk_text: Adding that it had worked hard to promote a nationwide fall in crime in 2019.Safety concerns along with inconvenient flights, poor infrastructure, and high costs have long held back Brazil's tourism industry, which lags its South American neighbours.Next article.
